original_text: Snap Shareholder Alert INVESTOR ACTION REMINDER: The Schall Law Firm Reminds Investors of a Class Action Lawsuit Against Snap Inc. and Encourages Investors with Losses in Excess of $250,000 to Contact the Firm Kessler Topaz Meltzer & Check, LLP - Important Deadline Reminder for Snap Inc. Investors
